title: How to Win a Skirmish Immediately As the Allies in Red Alert 3

steps.headline: Start Red Alert 3 and begin a skirmish game playing as the Allies
Train the following from the barracks as soon as it is built:
steps.description:
A War Dog{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d4/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/d/d4/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/aid615684-v4-527px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"527","bigHeight":"395","licensing":"

"} 5 or so Peacekeepers{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/df/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/d/df/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet2.jpg/aid615684-v4-555px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"555","bigHeight":"416","licensing":"

"} 3 or so Engineers{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b3/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet3.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet3.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/b/b3/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet3.jpg/aid615684-v4-585px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"585","bigHeight":"439","licensing":"

"} Possibly 3 Javelin Launchers. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/94/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet4.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet4.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/9/94/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet4.jpg/aid615684-v4-566px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"566","bigHeight":"424","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"}

steps.headline: Remember to continue building your base.
Send the war dog as soon as it's trained, wait for at least three peacekeepers and send those, then send engineers as they are trained.
Send the war dog to kill any infantry your opponent has made, then move the peacekeepers as close as you can to the enemy barracks and have them destroy it.
Have your engineers capture key structures as they arrive.
steps.description: Your priorities should be the construction yard first, refineries second, any unit building structures third.

steps.headline: Provided you've worked fast enough and done this correctly, you have completely destroyed your opponent's ability to fight.
steps.description: Even if it only partially worked, as long as you got the construction yard or the refinery you have seriously set back your opponent and should have no trouble winning at your leisure.

text:
Start Red Alert 3 and begin a skirmish game playing as the Allies Build a Barracks immediately Train the following from the barracks as soon as it is built: A War Dog{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d4/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/d/d4/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/aid615684-v4-527px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"527","bigHeight":"395","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} 5 or so Peacekeepers{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/df/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/d/df/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet2.jpg/aid615684-v4-555px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"555","bigHeight":"416","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} 3 or so Engineers{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b3/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet3.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet3.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/b/b3/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet3.jpg/aid615684-v4-585px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"585","bigHeight":"439","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Possibly 3 Javelin Launchers. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/94/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet4.jpg/v4-460px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet4.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/9/94/Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet4.jpg/aid615684-v4-566px-Win-a-Skirmish-Immediately-As-the-Allies-in-Red-Alert-3-Step-3Bullet4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"566","bigHeight":"424","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Remember to continue building your base. Send the war dog as soon as it's trained, wait for at least three peacekeepers and send those, then send engineers as they are trained. Send the war dog to kill any infantry your opponent has made, then move the peacekeepers as close as you can to the enemy barracks and have them destroy it. Have your engineers capture key structures as they arrive. Your priorities should be the construction yard first, refineries second, any unit building structures third. Provided you've worked fast enough and done this correctly, you have completely destroyed your opponent's ability to fight. Even if it only partially worked, as long as you got the construction yard or the refinery you have seriously set back your opponent and should have no trouble winning at your leisure.
